(as of Nov 30,2022 07:12:33 UTC – Details)



【High-Performance Processor】Beelink MINI S built-in faster 11 generation Intel Jasper Lake Processor N5095 base frequency 2.0GHz, up to 2.9 GHz. (4C/4T, 4M Cache) It runs much faster than i3-5005u, N3450, j3455, j4125, j4105 etc. chips. Loaded With 8gb DDR4 Ram, 256gb SSD, creates a very smooth experience for your visually home entertainment, streaming video, Web browsing, work, and games.
【Storage Expansion Options】The MINI S Mini Computer built-in 8 GB DDR4, 256GB M.2 SSD (M.2 is much better than mSATA/HDD in terms of both smaller size and higher transfer performance) and supports up to 2TB of 2.5-inch SATA HDD / SSD.
【Support 4K Dual Screen Display】The Mini Computer equipped with Intel UHD Graphics to support support 4K FPS video playback, which brings you first-class viewing .Dual HDMI allows you to connect two displays at the same time,thereby reducing waiting time and improving your work efficiency.
【Efficient Heat Dissipation & WIFI5】Beelink Mini Pc comes with quite large fan and heat sink which can keep the Mini Pc cool and allow the heat to be perfectly dissipated.Built in WIFI 5 (802.11 b/g/n/ac), Bluetooth 4.0.
【Auto Power On & Beelink Technical Support】If you want to auto power on, please send us the barcode at the bottom of the machine first, and we will send the corresponding tutorial file. All our products have obtained FCC, CE ROSH certification. We provide 1 year 7 days / 24 hours service and lifetime help with technical issues, no need to worry about quality issues, just email our customer service team.

It also comes with 500GB M.2 SSD NVME 2280,supports upgrade storage to 2TB (excluded) and via 2.5-inch HDD up to 2T (excluded).It can smoothly handle multiple tasks being performed.
【Efficient Cooling System & WIFI 5】Beelink SEi8 comes with large Fan (max speed<4500rpm) and Dual F6 pipe+heat sink which can keep the mini pc cool and allow the heat to be perfectly dissipated.Support wifi 5(802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.2, more stable and efficient , bringing you a better internet experience.

Pre-installed Genuine Win 11 Pro. Which can turn your desk into a powerful workstation just by adding a keyboard and mouse. WiFi 6E(802.11ax) ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $549.00 - $519.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:01 UTC – Details)



◆New Upgrade – Mini pc powered with AMD Ryzen 5 5600H 6 Core/12 Thread(3.3GHz up to 4.2GHz, L2 3MB L3 16MB Cache), Radeon Graphics 7 Core 1800MHz. Pre-installed Genuine Win 11 Pro. Which can turn your desk into a powerful workstation just by adding a keyboard and mouse. WiFi 6E(802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.2 is faster and more stable data transmission and there is no network congestion. More wireless support, say goodbye to cluttered desktop.
◆Triple Screen Display & 4K UHD Output – AMD Radeon Graphics 6 Core 1800MHz delivers powerful graphics processing. Triple screen 4K@60Hz display output via dual HDMI and Type-C port. Enjoy super first-class picture quality and easily improve work efficiency. Fully capable of browsing the internet, using Office, Adobe PR and PS applications, 4K videos playback, etc.
◆Freely Expand Capacity – Mini computer loaded with 32GB RAM DDR4 (2666MHz). Dual channel DDR4 upgradeable to max 64GB(2 x 32GB, up to 3200MHz). And 500GB M.2 SSD NVME 2280 (upgradeable to max 2TB), reading speed up to 1900mb/s and writing speed up to 1700mb/s. Supporting up to 2TB external 2.5-inch 7mm HDD expansion (not included). Reduce latency, powerful loading and processing capabilities for a smoother experience.
◆Multi Interface Design & Meet Deeply Needs – Beelink SER4 small computer is equipped with 2*HDMI2.1 ports, 3*USB3.0 ports, 1*USB2.0 port, 1*Type-C video&data port, 1*DC Jack, 1*RJ45 1000m port, 1*3.5mm Audio Jack(HP&MIC) port. Supports Gigabit Ethernet RJ45 1000M network connectivity. The small pc also can be used for gaming and virtualization work.
◆Keep Desktop Quiet & Tidy – The size of the micro computer is only 5 x 4.5 x 1.6 inches, as palm-size, making minipc more convenient to carry. Installed the pc portable on the back of the monitor via the VESA interface to make it an all in one computer and to make the office cleaner. ABS frame, 2 copper tubes, upgraded aluminum plate and fan design also help this mini pc works better, quiet and efficient heat dissipation. Meet your daily needs for work and entertainment.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Price: $138.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:00:15 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Small size–saving space

Small dimension (106 x 106 x 18 mm) and light weight (232g) make the mini pc more convenient to carry outside. You can also hang it behind the monitor, which greatly saves your space.

4K Dual display

Beelink T4 Pro can give you wonderful visual enjoyment thanks to the built-in HD Graphic 500. You can smoothly enjoy the 4K videos. Meanwhile, you can connect 2 displays at the same time with 2 HDMI ports, which greatly saves your time.

CPU: Apollo Lake Processor N3350

Beelink T4 Pro Mini PC is equipped with N3350 Processor (2M Cache, 1.10GHz up to 2.40GHz) and pre-installed with Win 10. The powerful hardware gives you a stable Internet environment.

Storage

Built-in 4GB LPDDR3 RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM, the mini computer has enough storage space for you to deal with daily work, watch videos, browse the Internet, home entertainment, etc. Fully meets your daily needs.

Dual WiFi and Bluetooth

T4 Pro Mini PC provides 2.4G + 5.8G dual WiFi, Gigabit Ethernet and Bluetooth 4.0. You can enjoy stable wireless connection and high transfer speed.

Heat sink and fan

The powerful heat dissipation function (built-in heat sink and quiet fan) enables the mini desktop computer to cool down in time, improving the operating efficiency.

Interface: 1 x DC in port, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x LAN port, 2 x HDMI ports, 1x Audio Jack (HP&MIC)Packages: 1 x T4 Pro Mini PC, 1 x HDMI Cable (100cm), 1 x Power Adapter 12V/1.5-2A, 1 x User Manual

[N3350 Processor] Beelink T4 Pro mini pc has installed with Win 10 Apollo Lake Processor N3350 which has 2M Cache, 1.1GHz up to 2.4GHz. It provides a stable environment for work and entertainment.
[4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM] Loaded with 4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM, the mini computer could offer you enough memory storage to meet your daily needs such as entertainment, video, web browsing, and work.
[Dual HDMI] With 2 HDMI ports, the mini pc can easily connects 2 monitors at the same time. Meanwhile, it comes with HD Graphics 500 so you can enjoy the web surfing, home theater, game and so on with your family members.
[Dual WiFi and Bluetooth] The mini pc provides 2.4G + 5.8G dual WiFi and Gigabit Ethernet. It means that you can transfer and download data at a high speed. Besides, you are available to connect with many devices which support Bluetooth connection because of the built-in Bluetooth 4.0.
[Ultra-thin Stylish Design] Thanks to the ultra thin design (106 x 106 x 18 mm and light weight of 232g), this mini pc can be hang behind the monitor and even carried on the journey, which can greatly save your space. Besides, it has the fan and heat sink to cool down the pc and make the cpu and hard drive work normal.

Product Description

Smaller Mini PC!

Why Choose Beelink MiniS Mini PC?

1.Newest Design: Smaller!!! As big as palm-size. Compact in size, you can take it anywhere you go.

2.Professional: MiniS mini computer is designed for the business office. Compatible with professional working software.

3.Cost-effective: Built-in Gen 11th N5095 (4C/4T, 4M Cache, 2.0GHz up to 2.9GHz), Which supports DDR4 single-channel, enjoying the extremely fast speed. Equipped with UHD Graphics, dual HDMI and type-c allow you to connect three monitors and multi-tasking.

Note:

If you received a mini pc with windows 11 system, if you need windows 10 pro system, please send us a message and we will guide you to install windows 10 pro.

Top Choice for the Business Office and Education Industry!

Beelink MiniS Mini PC Basic Specifications

CPU: Intel Jasper Lake(Celeron) Processor N5095(4C/4T, 4M Cache, 2GHz up to 2.9GHz) enables better multi-tasking

GPU : Intel UHD Graphics & Dual HDMI2.0 Ports. Support dual display and 4K ultra high definition streaming capability, giving you a best in class television experience with true to life picture quality.

OS: Windows 11 Pro

Language: Multi-language

RAM: 8GB

Hard Disk: 256GB

Network: WiFi 802.11 b/g/n/ac, 2.4+5.8G WiFi, Ethernet 1000Mbps LAN, Bluetooth 4.0

Adapter: Input: 100-240V AC, 50/60Hz , Output: 12V 3A

Fully capable of browsing the internet, word processing (runs Microsoft Office and LibreOffice smoothly), watching movies and photo processing!

Tips to Better Use Mini Pc

You can add a 2TB removable hard drive via the USB 3.0 port, which will allow the device to store even more and your files as you want

Regularly delete the software distribution folder in windows directory to keep updates size use down. This folder is used for updates for windows

Uninstall any program or app that isn’t needed or used. Once done, there was enough space to update Windows

Beelink MiniS Mini computer Support RTC Wake Settings, Auto Power On, Wake On Lan, PXE Boot etc. You can set it on the BIOS(Press the DEL key immediately after pressing the power button to enter the BOIS page)

Note:

To avoid initial setup issues, the first time you use this mini pc , don’t connect network or wifi until the windows system of your mini pc is running!

Rich Interface and Compact Size

Rich interface allows you th connect your home and office set wirelessly and wirely, like your projector, printer and your home TV. As big as palm size and light in weight, which allows easily carry it with you and also attach to the back of the monitor.

Compatible Stylem

Licensed Windows 11 Pro 64bit pre-installed on mini pcs with no visible bloatware.

You can also install Linux OS!

Package

1* Beelink MINI S Mini PC

2*HDMI 100CM&25CM 1.4

1* Power adapter (12V/3A)

1*Wall-Mounted bracket

1* Manual

Major CPU Running Scores, More Powerful than Others!

Common FAQ:

Q1: What should I do if I find a product with a lower pri~ce within a month?

Please do not re~turn, contact our store staff to re~fund the difference, BeelinkUS let you enjoy the lowest pri~ce.(7-day pri~ce protection & excluding official pro~motion days)

Q2: What should I do if I don’t like the windows 11 pro system?

Please do not return, please contact the service staff of our store to get windows 10 pro system files and tutorials.

Q3: How to enter BIOS?

Press “delete” to enter the BIOS settings; press “F7” to enter the boot options menu (click continuously immediately after booting).

Q4: What should I do if a product defect is found?

Please do not return it, you can contact our staff to solve the problem for you, or make compensation. We offer 1-year factory professional support & 7*24 hours online service.

◆Smaller but Equally Powerful – Compared with U59 mini pc, MiniS is more compact, only about 4.5x 4 x1.6 inches. As big as palm-size, easier to carry anywhere you go. Powered by 11th Gen processor N5095 (4C/4T, 4M Cache, up to 2.9GHz), delivers incredible responsiveness and is more smooth than J4125, J3455, J4205, N3450, etc. Easily switch back and forth between more applications with 8 + 256GB memory configuration. Compact size makes the mini computers the top choice for your light OFFICE work.
◆UHD Graphics & Dual HDMI2.0 – Mini desktop computer has equipped with UHD Graphics, supporting 4k video playback and web surfing, or connect to your projector as a home theatre, enjoy a variety of entertainment. Dual HDMI2.0 allows you to connect two monitors at the same time, simplifying and doubling your work efficiency.
◆Wireless Supports – The latest wireless connectivity with 802.11ac Dual Band 2.4 & 5GHz Wi-Fi, offers speeds up to 450Mbps on the 2.4GHz band & 1300Mbps on the 5GHz. In addition, there is a built-in Bluetooth4.0 system. High-speed wireless connection technology, reliable and efficient transmission speed, providing a faster internet experience for browsing, streaming and gaming.
◆Intelligent Design – What makes the small pc stand out from other micro pc is that it has an empty expansion bay to allow adding. Beelink MiniS mini desktop pc has built-in 8GB DDR4 RAM, 256GB M.2 SATA SSD (Support up to 2TB of 2.5in 7mm SATA3 HDD /M.2 SATA3 SSD 2280, not included). Also, the VESA mount can free you from the messy desktop. It is convenient to hide the mini pcs on the back of the monitor or HDTV.
◆Efficient Heat Dissipation & Multi-interfaces – The mini computer built-in fantastic cooling fan, heat sink, and hard drive cooler help cool down the hardware and reduce hardware loss, delivering faster response speed. MINI S desktop pc features a variety of interfaces design (4*USB3.0, 2*HDMI2.0, 1*RJ45 1000M LAN, 1*Audio Jack, 1*DC Jack). It also comes with 1 power adapter, 2*HDMI cables, and 1*VESA mount. Small computers easily meet office business needs, home audio and video needs.

Beelink Mini PC

Product Description

Smaller Mini PC!

Why Choose Beelink MiniS Mini PC?

1.Newest Design: Smaller!!! As big as palm-size. Compact in size, you can take it anywhere you go.

2.Professional: MiniS mini computer is designed for the business office. Compatible with professional working software.

3.Cost-effective: Built-in Gen 11th N5095 (4C/4T, 4M Cache, 2.0GHz up to 2.9GHz), Which supports DDR4 single-channel, enjoying the extremely fast speed. Equipped with UHD Graphics, dual HDMI and type-c allow you to connect three monitors and multi-tasking.

Note:

If you received a mini pc with windows 11 system, if you need windows 10 pro system, please send us a message and we will guide you to install windows 10 pro.

Top Choice for the Business Office and Education Industry!

Beelink MiniS Mini PC Basic Specifications

CPU: Intel Jasper Lake(Celeron) Processor N5095(4C/4T, 4M Cache, 2GHz up to 2.9GHz) enables better multi-tasking

GPU : Intel UHD Graphics & Dual HDMI2.0 Ports. Support dual display and 4K ultra high definition streaming capability, giving you a best in class television experience with true to life picture quality.

OS: Windows 11 Pro

Language: Multi-language

RAM: 8GB

Hard Disk: 256GB

Network: WiFi 802.11 b/g/n/ac, 2.4+5.8G WiFi, Ethernet 1000Mbps LAN, Bluetooth 4.0

Adapter: Input: 100-240V AC, 50/60Hz , Output: 12V 3A

Fully capable of browsing the internet, word processing (runs Microsoft Office and LibreOffice smoothly), watching movies and photo processing!

Tips to Better Use Mini Pc

You can add a 2TB removable hard drive via the USB 3.0 port, which will allow the device to store even more and your files as you want

Regularly delete the software distribution folder in windows directory to keep updates size use down. This folder is used for updates for windows

Uninstall any program or app that isn’t needed or used. Once done, there was enough space to update Windows

Beelink MiniS Mini computer Support RTC Wake Settings, Auto Power On, Wake On Lan, PXE Boot etc. You can set it on the BIOS(Press the DEL key immediately after pressing the power button to enter the BOIS page)

Note:

To avoid initial setup issues, the first time you use this mini pc , don’t connect network or wifi until the windows system of your mini pc is running!

Rich Interface and Compact Size

Rich interface allows you th connect your home and office set wirelessly and wirely, like your projector, printer and your home TV. As big as palm size and light in weight, which allows easily carry it with you and also attach to the back of the monitor.

Compatible Stylem

Licensed Windows 11 Pro 64bit pre-installed on mini pcs with no visible bloatware.

You can also install Linux OS!

Package

1* Beelink MINI S Mini PC

2*HDMI 100CM&25CM 1.4

1* Power adapter (12V/3A)

1*Wall-Mounted bracket

1* Manual

Major CPU Running Scores, More Powerful than Others!

Please do not return, please contact the service staff of our store to get windows 10 pro system files and tutorials.

Q3: How to enter BIOS?

Press “delete” to enter the BIOS settings; press “F7” to enter the boot options menu (click continuously immediately after booting).

Q4: What should I do if a product defect is found?

Please do not return it, you can contact our staff to solve the problem for you, or make compensation. We offer 1-year factory professional support & 7*24 hours online service.

◆Smaller but Equally Powerful – Compared with U59 mini pc, MiniS is more compact, only about 4.5x 4 x1.6 inches. As big as palm-size, easier to carry anywhere you go. Powered by 11th Gen processor N5095 (4C/4T, 4M Cache, up to 2.9GHz), delivers incredible responsiveness and is more smooth than J4125, J3455, J4205, N3450, etc. Easily switch back and forth between more applications with 8 + 256GB memory configuration. Compact size makes the mini computers the top choice for your light OFFICE work.
◆UHD Graphics & Dual HDMI2.0 – Mini desktop computer has equipped with UHD Graphics, supporting 4k video playback and web surfing, or connect to your projector as a home theatre, enjoy a variety of entertainment. Dual HDMI2.0 allows you to connect two monitors at the same time, simplifying and doubling your work efficiency.
◆Wireless Supports – The latest wireless connectivity with 802.11ac Dual Band 2.4 & 5GHz Wi-Fi, offers speeds up to 450Mbps on the 2.4GHz band & 1300Mbps on the 5GHz. In addition, there is a built-in Bluetooth4.0 system. High-speed wireless connection technology, reliable and efficient transmission speed, providing a faster internet experience for browsing, streaming and gaming.
◆Intelligent Design – What makes the small pc stand out from other micro pc is that it has an empty expansion bay to allow adding. Beelink MiniS mini desktop pc has built-in 8GB DDR4 RAM, 256GB M.2 SATA SSD (Support up to 2TB of 2.5in 7mm SATA3 HDD /M.2 SATA3 SSD 2280, not included). Also, the VESA mount can free you from the messy desktop. It is convenient to hide the mini pcs on the back of the monitor or HDTV.
◆Efficient Heat Dissipation & Multi-interfaces – The mini computer built-in fantastic cooling fan, heat sink, and hard drive cooler help cool down the hardware and reduce hardware loss, delivering faster response speed. MINI S desktop pc features a variety of interfaces design (4*USB3.0, 2*HDMI2.0, 1*RJ45 1000M LAN, 1*Audio Jack, 1*DC Jack). It also comes with 1 power adapter, 2*HDMI cables, and 1*VESA mount. Small computers easily meet office business needs, home audio and video needs.

Product Description

Model: Beelink SER5560UProcessor: AMD Ryzen 5 5560U 2.3-4.0GHz, 6 Cores 12 Threads, L2 3MB L3 8MB;Processor Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics 6core 1600 MHz;OS: Windows 11 Pro 64 bits pre-installed. support Windows 10 and Ubuntu.RAM: 16GB 3200Mhz DDR4 (2 x DDR4 Slots, up to 64GB) ;Disk: 500GB M.2 2280 NVMe SSD (up to 2TB);Extended storage: 2.5 inch 7mm SATA SSD/ HDD, up to 2TB.Thermal Design Power (TDP): 15W~25W;Ethernet: 1 x 1000Mbps LAN ;WiFi: WiFi 6E (802.11ax), Bluetooth 5.2 ;Packages & Accessories: 1 x Beelink SER5 Mini PC, 2 x HDMI Cables, 1 x US Power adapter 19V 3A , 1 x Wall Mounting bracket. 1 x Manual.

Upgrade-Friendly

Gaming

Equipped with AMD Radeon Graphics, Beelink SER5 is also a high-performing gaming PC, can run games at significantly higher frame rates, enjoy the game with friends without hindrance.

Stunning Visuals

Take entertainment to Ultra HD. You can enjoy 4K visuals with the AMD Radeon Graphics or expand your viewing area with 2 displays featuring Dual HDMI Port .

Daily essentials

Beelink SER5 is an affordable and space-saving solution that helps you get work done. Browse the web, check emails, or do word processing as you would on any normal PC.

【High Performance】Powered with AMD Ryzen 5 5560U CPU (6Core/12 threads. 2.3 ~ 4.0 GHz). 16GB DDR4-RAM and 500GB M.2 NVMe SSD Pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro 64bit, automatically activated after connecting to the Internet.Supports Ubuntu and Windows 10.
【Dual 4K output】the SER5 mini PC comes with integrated AMD Radeon graphics 6-core 1600 MHz. 4K@60Hz dual display output supplied via dual HDMI ports that allow you to easily multitasking. Stream 4K video, edit media, work from home or do your homework. Get ready for incredible graphics, sound and performance.
【Large capacity】Installed DDR4 16GB RAM (2x SODIMM slot, can be upgraded to 64GB), installed 500GB M.2 NVMe SSD (up to 2TB) and can expand the storage via 2.5 inch 7mm SATA HDD slot for your personal needs.
【Small and powerful】Easy to set up and configure. Saves desk properties and uses less energy than equivalent alternatives. Metal Frame Design It is widely used for light games, image editing, office applications, media centres, mini servers and much more.
【Other functions and guarantee】Supports RTC wake up/wake on lan/auto power on (BiOS setting)/network boot. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions. We offer lifetime technical support, 2 year worry-free warranty and 24 hours customer service.

Product Description

Why Choose Beelink U59 Mini PC

Easy To Carry – Beelink MINI S Mini PC measures ‎4.52 x 4.01 x 1.61 inches and weighs as low as 11.35 ounces. You can hold it in your hand or put it in your business bag and carry it with you.

Cost-effective – Beelink Micro PC uses N5095CPU. Its base operating frequency is up to 2.9GHz (4C/4T) and it supports a 4 MB L3 Cache.

Multiple Interfaces – The desktop computer has a unique interface designed with 4 x USB3.0 ports, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x DC Jack port, 1 x RJ45 1000M port, 1 x Audio Jack (HP&MIC) port, 1 x Type-C port.

Expandable Storage – The mini computers have two Internal Connector, one is M.2 2280 SSD, the other one is a 2.5-inch 7mm SATA HDD which support up to 500GB~2TB large expandable storage.

Support Auto Power On – The windows computer Support WOL (Wake On LAN) and Auto Power On functions, you can watch our demo video for operation, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact Beelink.

After-sales Service – Beelink focuses on mini pc R&D and sales. We have a professional after-sales service. As long as you purchase our products, We offer 1-year factory professional support & 7*24 hours online service.

N5095 Vs J4125

Mini PC Features

𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐥 𝐍𝟓𝟎𝟗𝟓 𝐂𝐏𝐔

This MINI S mini PC powered by Intel 11th Generation Quad-Core N5095 (More Faster Than 10th Generation J4125). It’s base operating frequency up to 2.9GHz (4C/4T) and it supports 4MB cache. Stable low-power processor with powerful performance, say goodbye to the system freezing and buffering.

𝐃𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐲

The Micro Computer is equipped with Dual HDMI 2.0 Ports. When you buy this computer, we will give you HDMI 100CM&20CM for free, you can connect two monitors at the same time, which can improve your work Efficiency.

𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐞𝐬

The mini computer has a unique interface designed with 4 x USB3.0 ports, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x DC Jack port, 1 x RJ45 1000M port, 1 x Audio Jack (HP&MIC) port. It can connect keyboard, mouse, camera, gamepad, monitor, TV, headset and sound, etc.

Common Question & Answer

Is Windows 11 Pro already installed?

A1: Yes, our beelink MINI S comes with Windows 11 Pro pre-installed. There is no need for an additional activation key. You are free to use another operating system, such as Linux, Android x86, Ubuntu, or FydeOS.

Q2: How to set up Dual Screen Display?

A2: Please click and select Start>Settings>System>Display. Your PC should automatically detect your monitor and display your desktop. If you don’t see the monitor, select Detect.

Q3: How to enter BIOS?

A3: Press “delete” to enter the BIOS settings; press “F7” to enter the boot options menu (click continuously immediately after booting).

Can I play video games?

Of course, you can play Minecraft, PUBG, Fortnite, GTA5, CS:Go, and LOL smoothly.

Powerful Performance: Beelink MINI S mini pc is powered by 11th Generation Quad-Core N5095 (More Faster Than 10th Generation J4125). The lithography process of the CPU is 10nm, and its base operating frequency is up to 2.9GHz (4C/4T) and it supports a 4MB smart cache. The micro pc Pre-installed W11 Pro 64-Bits Os, running smoothly. Create a smooth experience for your streaming video, visual home entertainment, and light office, bid farewell to system stalls and buffering.dget computadoras de escritorio
High-capacity Storage: The micro desktops computer built-in 8GB DDR4, 256GB M.2 SSD (M.2 is much better than mSATA in terms of both smaller size and higher transfer performance). The Mini Computer has two Internal Connector, one is M.2 SATA SSD 2280, the other one is a 2.5in-7mm SATA HDD which support up to 500GB~2TB large expandable storage. And also you can add a USB 3.0 hard drive port to expand 2TB HDD.
Multiple Interfaces & Function: The desktop computer adopts independently designed heat dissipation technology, and at the same time, it runs close to noiseless. The mini pc has a unique interface designed with 2 x HDMI ports, 4 x USB3.0 ports, 1 x RJ45 1000M Port, 1 x Audio Jack (HP&MIC) port. Supports connecting monitors, projectors, Mobile phones, and other equipment. Moreover, this computer supports Wake On LAN, Auto Power On, PXE Boot. To meet your various needs.
Dual Screen Display: The Micro Computer is equipped with Dual HDMI 2.0 Ports. When you buy this computer, we will give you HDMI 100CM&20CM for free, you can connect two monitors at the same time, which can improve your work Efficiency. The Beelink mini pc uses Intel UHD Graphics to support 4K HD video playback. You can easily enjoy 4K video playback, or connect to your projector as a home theater and enjoy various entertainment.
Widely Used & Safety: The Beelink Mini PC can be used for visual home entertainment, office, light games, digital security, surveillance, digital signage, billboards, media center, conference room, etc. In addition, the cheap pc also supports Linux operating system(ubuntu), meets server construction, software compilation, or other DIY needs. All of our desktop computers obtained FCC, ROSH, CE certification. We also offer 1-year factory professional support & 7*24 hours online customer service.
